artist: Artist: Henri Joseph Hesse; Lithographer: Les Langlume
description: portrait half length of man facing left looking out toward viewer; long curly hair; lace collar; open neck
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate in black: [Imp. Lith. de Langlumé   HESSE 1825/ JOUVENET/ D\'aprés son Portrait peint par lui meme/ on souscrit l\'Edituer rue Cassette No. 16]; on sheet in pencil:[1-590]
title: Portrait of Jouvenet
